I've been with myself for the longest time, and it's been a bumpy ride.
i have two border collies.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
Not bad, just hanging out at home with my dogs.
Nice! I love dogs. What kind do you have?
I have two border collies. They're a lot of work, but they're so cute and cuddly.
That sounds awesome! I love watching Border Collies herd sheep.
Yeah, they're really smart dogs. I love teaching them new tricks.
I've always wanted to learn how to train a dog. Maybe I'll look into that.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch Game of Thrones, go to the gym, and cook with my mom.
Game of Thrones is great! I'm a big fan. I love cooking too. What's your favorite dish to make?
I love making lasagna. It's so easy to make and it always turns out delicious.
Lasagna is my favorite! I love making it too.
It's so good. What other hobbies do you have?
I like to read and go for walks. I'm also a big fan of stand-up comedy.
I love stand-up comedy too! I go to a lot of shows in my city.
Me too! I'm always looking for new comedians to watch.
I love finding new comedians. It's so much fun to see someone new perform.
Yeah, it's always a great experience
